name: Astronomics Rise of a New Empire
name_original: Astronomics Rise of a New Empire
description:
Astronomics Rise of a new Empire is a easy to learn space real time global strategy(4X) game in which you'll create a new empire. Choose your path, whether you support the rebellion against the Eternal Empire, form a trade alliance, join the pirates or seek domination of the galaxy, only you decide.

Planet Management

Control your planet, the population of your planet is divided into 3 classes with 2 subclasses each.
Issue directives and increase the growth of your population, but you should not neglect their satisfaction, because otherwise it can quickly come to an uprising.

Trade Routes

Build a network of trade routes between the planets to boost your faction's economy.
You need different materials to produce the components for your fleet in your factories.

Espionage

Send spies to the planets of your enemies and allies to keep up to date with their actions.
If you need to sabotage a factory or eliminate a politician, it is advisable to have an experienced agent at hand.

Diplomacy

Dive into the complex diplomacy system and conduct negotiations with other factions, make agreements, alliances or prepare your alliance for war.


Ship Design

In Astronomics Rise of a new Empire you'll create your own ship designs that you can then produce in your shipyard.
Build your own fleet to subjugate the galaxy.

Conquest

Destroy your enemies' fleets and conquer their planets. Astronomics Rise of a new Empire offers a complex combat system with which you'll be able to engage in battle against your enemies.


Politics

Each of your planets has a governor and 6 ministers, these are subordinate to only one, namely your faction leader.
But how you fill these positions is up to you, you have different politicians at your disposal, but they all have different ambitions and goals.

Research

Explore new technologies and discover the wonders of the galaxy.
